dcterms:creator: H. Paul Williams
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of production planning problems that illustrate various types of constraints used in mixed-integer linear programming.
dcterms:title: Production Planning Problems from H. Paul Williams' textbook

dcterms:creator: S. Velez
C. T. Maravelias
dcterms:description: A chemical production scheduling MILP model that considers a planning horizon partitioned into time slots, focusing on task processing decisions and inventory levels.
dcterms:title: Chemical Production Scheduling Example

dcterms:creator: J. T. de Kruijff
C. A. Hurkens
T. G. de Kok
dcterms:description: An MILP model for mid-term production planning tailored for high-tech low-volume supply chains, focusing on balancing quantities and assigning values.
dcterms:title: Mid-term Production Planning for High-Tech Low-Volume Supply Chains

dcterms:creator: A. Ghoniem
V. Pereira
H. Gomes Costa
dcterms:description: An MILP model for a university course timetabling problem, focusing on assigning courses to professors and time slots with various constraints.
dcterms:title: University Course Timetabling Problem

dcterms:creator: M. P. Seixas
A. B. Mendes
dcterms:description: A routing problem involving a multitrip vehicle routing scenario with time windows, focusing on decision variables related to vehicle routes.
dcterms:title: Multitrip Vehicle Routing Problem with Time Windows
